name: d3-voronoi-treemap
description: D3 plugin which computes a treemap based on Voronoi tesselation
author: Kcnarf <fl.franck.lebeau@gmail.com>

scripts.pretest: yarn run build && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/utils.js -- ./src/utils.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/plane3D.js -- ./src/plane3D.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/conflictList.js -- ./src/conflictList.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/vertex.js -- ./src/vertex.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/vector.js -- ./src/vector.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/hEdge.js -- ./src/hEdge.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/face.js -- ./src/face.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/convexHull.js -- ./src/convexHull.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/powerDiagram.js -- ./src/powerDiagram.js
scripts.precommit: yarn run test && uglifyjs build/d3-voronoi-treemap.js -c -m -o build/d3-voronoi-treemap.min.js
scripts.prepublish: zip -j build/d3-voronoi-treemap.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-voronoi-treemap.js build/d3-voronoi-treemap.min.js
